channel.title: Hazzscape 718| All Skills| All minigames| all bosses and more!
channel.description:
Hazzscape 718
Links & Downloads
Website: http://www.hazzscape.weebly.com Download Client: http://www.Hazzscape.weebly.com
LATEST UPDATE: - FIGHT CAVES: 3 LAST WAVES - GET TOKHAAR-KAL + FIRECAPE! HAZZSCAPE #1 -VIEW HISCORES IN-GAME! [VIA NOTICEBOARD]
-Some sick features- -Development team which listens and understands players. -Minigames such as: Fight Kiln, Fight Caves and i can tell you a secret, we are making next Fist of Guthix. (already about 40% done.) -HD Graphics (Fullscreen, rezisable and fixed). -Server's Internet Speed: 100MB/s. -Experienced Server Programmers, so we are not a typical download and host server. We'll Include unique features. -3 Days FREE Trial donator. - With full features. -Many places to explore (Artisan's Workshop, Lava-Flow Mining, and other teleports e.g 30 bosses). -Player support forums + in-game. -Dedicated development team. -24/7 VPS Without lags.
More Media "Area Manager" - Tells you anywhere where you go. -Screen fading. -Location detection. -Text scrolling from left. -Tells you where you are and what is new currently in the current location that you're in. [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2jgqhg.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/w6sfmc.jpg[/img] http://gyazo.com/487aca6f0fc06fcbef2da7fc5c9ff8ff [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/25q7ubo.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2n82b1t.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/5dmc1e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2qdpwgp.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2dace10.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/syo9pd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/351wb47.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2ynhv1h.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/14n22js.jpg[/img]

LATEST UPDATE:

  • FIGHT CAVES: 3 LAST WAVES - GET TOKHAAR-KAL + FIRECAPE! HAZZSCAPE #1

-Some sick features-
-Development team which listens and understands players.
-Minigames such as: Fight Kiln, Fight Caves and i can tell you a secret, we are making next Fist of Guthix. (already about 40% done.)
-HD Graphics (Fullscreen, rezisable and fixed).
-Server’s Internet Speed: 100MB/s.
